about_the_game:
No heartbeat. No pulse. Lots and lots of feelings.

With no humans left to stop them, the machines of Crimson City are finally free to live life to the fullest.

DATING OF THE FUTURE is a visual novel that takes you on an adventure through the utopian world of the future, a century after humanity left forever.

Take on the role of the android porn star Vee as you embark on an eclectic and bizarre narrative journey like no other, making friends, enemies, and learning about the complex relationship between robots and sex.

STORY

You play as Vee, a videographer working for the biggest porn studio in Crimson City.

Vee’s always been content by herself, but after she stumbles into a high-flying job as a porn star, her life turns upside down. Can she manage her newfound fame and keep her emotions in check while starring with unrequited loves, old friends, and new crushes?

Can Vee's practical attitude and bombshell body win friends and influence people?

It's all up to you!

CHARACTERS

Across the game’s six narrative chapters, you'll meet, befriend, and contend with a cast of strange individuals built for many unusual purposes.

LOLA

Lola is Vee’s boss, and they’ve been close friends for years after a certain “incident” at a work Christmas party. Despite this, their relationship has always felt business-casual. Can Vee address the simmering sexual tension and help her write a good porn script before the shoot?

MINNIE

Minnie is a high ranking government official turned renegade detective. All Vee knows is that she’s stern, sharp… And fruity. It’s up to Vee to help crack this cold case.

SONJA AND ROSIE

Sonja and Rosie are two of Vee’s oldest friends. There’s only one problem: Sonja and Rosie are head-over-heels in love with each other. Unable to admit their feelings, their relationship is complicated further when Rosie’s past comes crashing into the present. 

Caught in the middle, Vee can only do her best to help them sort their issues out–and if having Vee in the middle makes things less awkward, then so be it.

CALLIE

Callie is Lola's wife and the almighty ruler of the world. If looks could kill, she probably would've had an easier time during her violent uprising. Steer clear unless you want to have your faceplate torn off like cheap plastic. Get very close if you're into that.

If you don't like the way that this futuristic society has turned out, you can blame Callie. If you actually like the way it turned out, you can thank Lola. That's what the locals do, anyway.

FEATURES

  • Experience multiple routes of dating action!

  • Make meaningful choices. Tea or Coffee?

  • Explore Crimson City throughout your journey. Who knows where your friends will take you, and who knows where you'll take them?

  • Get emails from your friends so you can keep up with them. The same is actually true in real life.

  • Earn stickers to decorate your game. Can you collect them all?

  • Enjoy hand-drawn sex scenes with your co-stars.

  • Uncover the mysteries of Crimson City’s dark past and twisted future.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains explicit sex scenes. Visible nudity can be disabled in the game's settings.

The game makes reference to non-consensual sex, self harm, and suicide. None of these are depicted.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: DATING OF THE FUTURE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: No heartbeat. No pulse. Lots and lots of feelings. DATING OF THE FUTURE is a visual novel that takes you on an adventure through the utopian world of the future, a century after humanity left forever.
